channel.title: Hosting help
channel.description:
ok pimpscape is my source and it runs fine and ive read lots of tutorials and followed them to exact.....
1. do i log in with the server from no-ip or do i just login with 0.0.0.0?? coz wen i login with my servername its says (error connecting to server.must be down.click "cancel" then "start server" to make ur own) then wen i log in with 0.0.0.0 its fine

item.description:
